titleInfo.title: Andrews, Horace in Memphis, Tennessee to Eaton, John in Washington, D.C.

mods.note: Promises that the writer will resign his position if Eaton and SMith think it wise. Tells of Holms` visit to Memphis and plans for marriage and for serving as managing editor of the Pilot. News of Ballad, who found a position with the writer`s recommendation, and of Ku Klux Klan activity.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
